author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-3777: separate out Int/Long/Float/DoubleField to reduce traps

author: chirino
msg: Revert "Fix for APLO-160 Apollo becoming unresponsive when stressed with 48k connections." This change had a negative performance impact, instead
we should look into using the strategy outlined in APLO-163 to deal with large connection counts.
